value.title: NBA and Microsoft plan personalized, AI-powered game streaming
value.excerpt: To start, they’ll broadcast live and on-demand games via Microsoft Azure and add personalized real-time stats overlays. They’ll also explore new ways to share clips from historical video archives, reward viewers for participation and catch fans up on their favorite teams without having them search through all scores, headlines and highlights.

value.title: Amazon ‘bid high and lost’ on JEDI, Microsoft says after release of DoD watchdog report
value.excerpt: Microsoft took aim at Amazon in a blog post Wednesday, accusing its rival of seeking an unfair advantage as the two companies lock horns over the Pentagon’s JEDI contract. The Department of Defense awarded the Joint Enterprise Defense Infrastructure project to Microsoft last year despite Amazon’s apparent advantage during the bidding process.
